아~~주 조금 플레이해보았지만, 예상과 다른 차원의 병맛, 뭐지모르겠는게임의 목적, 근데, 재미잇으니 봐주겠다.....

Oh... el gran glorioso y espectacular Team Fortress 2, juego del 2007 que justo este 10 de octubre celebra sus 10 años!

Empecemos con lo bueno:

*Adictivo Gameplay, no muy generico por el hecho de que la variedad de armas que hay en este juego dependen mucho de la forma de como vas a jugar. Si eres de esos que les encanta jugar con su estrategia en vez de dar "w" mas click por todos lados. Aqui saltas, te cubres, lanzas algo y atacas con todo!

*Su lore. Si eres tambien de esos que leen todo sobre lo que juegan, su historia te va a facinar. Con videos de cada personaje y comics que relatan la historia del porque esta guerra de estos dos colores.

*Personajes... te van a gustar!

*Hats y cosmeticos! Personaliza a uno de las 9 clases y a jugar con clase!

*Una comunidad digna de un videojuego, con aportaciones al workshop que a todos nos encantan!

*Un increible balanceo de todas las armas, ninguna persona es superior a ti solo por tener una arma mejor, es la habilidad siempre la que gana!

LO MALOOO:

*Ser free to play no es malo! Pero tenemos el riesgo de tener jugadores tramposos, cascarabias e incluso gritones!

*Ser Free to Play y seguir jugando sin gastar ni un peso quita muchas de las maravillas! No todas pero sentiras que esa mochila pequeña no aguantara nada...

*Los precios de las tiendas de Valve son caros, y siempre se prefiere comprar de usuario a usuario!



Eso es todo, este juego le pongo un tremendo 9.5/10. Es increiblemente divertido y adictivo. Muy bien hecho, muy amado. DEBES JUGARLO!!

When I first starting playing in online mode I had trouble so when others helped me and had friends on it really give you the courage to do something and helpful when others dont play often or don't know what their doing, but I am saysing i love this game and im addictid. 

         playing TF2 changed my life with new friends and digital character addiction I LOVE the spy  and scout (spoilers if you hadn't played this game and hadn't experinced it fun!) but i've never played a game as fun as TF2 so HUGE THANKS!! to develipors (mind my spelling) Valve and the TF2 community as for my graditude ill never stop playing this game

Wspaniała i najlepsza gra dzieciństwa, jest przykładem idealnie zbalansowanej rozgrywki w walce między dwoma drużynami, każdy znajdzie w niej coś dla siebie. Trzeba się sporo natrudzić by gra stała się nudna. Jak najbardziej polecam.

A brillant and amazing game!!

When i first got the game i thought it was another Cod related game but no. Its awesomely fun with alot of different weapons to get, hats to get (You have to pay for some hats) and taunts. There are lots of gamemodes aswell, including king of the hill and capture the flag. To be honest having to buy matchmaking sucks a bit (unless you use your phone number with your account) and having to buy to get loot in mvm. I really think you should get this game. It’s free so give the developers a little bit of forgiveness for having some cosmetics that you have to pay for. Thanks !!

Very good game, sucks that it went downhill after Overwatch copied this. Now, all you see are whiny kids saying "Stop killing me, I'm friendly." But I digress, a very good game and fun for every and anyone who plays it.

its good

Heat the oven to 180C/350F/Gas 4.

    Line two 18cm/7in cake tins with baking parchment

    Cream the butter and the sugar together until pale. Use an electric hand mixer if you have one.

    Beat in the eggs.

    Sift over the flour and fold in using a large metal spoon.

    The mixture should be of a dropping consistency; if it is not, add a little milk.

    Divide the mixture between the cake tins and gently spread out with a spatula. Bake for 20-25 minutes until an inserted skewer comes out clean. Allow to stand for 5 minutes before turning on to a wire rack to cool.

    Sandwich the cakes together with jam, lemon curd or whipped cream and berries or just enjoy on its own.
